Package client.model

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Chat
    Contains all chat messages and their sources
    Game
    Game model class containing all local information provided by the server for a given game.
    GameManager
    Facade class which statically manages the client's games and updates the model based on the results from the server
    Log
    Contains all log messages and their sources
    MessageLine
    Contains a message body and the message's source.
    ResourceBank
    Contains a ResourceList whose values may not increase above 19.
    ResourceList
    Contains a list of all the resources in Catan.
    TradeOffer
    Handles a trade offer between two players
    TurnTracker
    Keeps track of the current turn and game state for a given game
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PlayerIndex
    Associates the index of a player with an enumerated value
    ResourceType
    Enumerates the resource types in Catan
    TurnTracker.GameStatus
    The different possible states of the game
